com.intellinum.mia.app.util

Class FlexiAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellinum.mia.app.util.FlexiAPI

  • public class FlexiAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    User: Sakti Date: 2/7/16 Time: 5:10 PM This class exposed usable API to ScriptIntepreter, so it can be called in onFocus, onExit and etc

      • executeUpdate

        public int executeUpdate(java.lang.String query,
                         java.lang.Object[] parameters,
                         boolean isCommit)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute Insert, Update and Delete query
        Parameters:
        query - Query
        parameters - Input parameters
        isCommit - commit the transactions. If true, the transaction will be automatically commit after execution
        Returns:
        total rows affected. -1 means query failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • executePLSQL

        public java.lang.Object[] executePLSQL(java.lang.String PLSQL,
                                       java.lang.Object[] parameters,
                                       java.lang.String[] parameterTypes)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute Stored Procedure
        Parameters:
        PLSQL - Name of the Stored Procedure
        parameters - Input parameters, If the parameter is for output, then use null
        parameterTypes - Input parameters type. S = String, N = Number, L = Long, F = Float, O = OutputObject, OS = Output String If the OutputObject (O) is a result set, it will be converted to TableResult. Example flexi.executePLSQL("INV_ITEM_INQ.INV_ITEM_INQUIRIES", new Object[]{null, 1884, 21421}, new String["O","N", "N"];
        Returns:
        Array of object consist of Output Parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute Stored Procedure

Example flexi.executePLSQL("INV_ITEM_INQ.INV_ITEM_INQUIRIES", new Object[]{null, 1884, 21421}, new String["O","N", "N"];
